channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
( I'm using hippiescape v2) i need help when ever i compile my server it says i dont have jdk 5.0 or 6.0 or any updates and i just downloaded jdk 6.0 3
i have another compiler called compile + restart and when i try to compile that it says:
could not find process: java 'javac' is not recognized as in internal or external command, operable program or batch file. commands LOADED. Objects LOADED. starting Hippiescape v2 on 0.0.0:43594 sum one help :)

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @crip_4_lyfe crip 4 lyfe
item.description:
@crip_4_lyfe wrote:

thanks it worked
1 error tho

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Try that one.

Read full topic
